welcome_message_body: Welcome to Penafiel, Portugal! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's historic charm, rich cultural heritage, and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Penafiel has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Vila Real Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Vila Real Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
